Summary: Heard sounds from behind, object passed overhead, hovered, shot straight up.
divs: sighting detailsmyself, along with 2 friends were sitting near the top of a slag dump in town where we rode bikes and motorcycles one evening talking about the day and planning tomorrows ride. we heard a strange rumbling sound behind us a few hundred feet away and then the sound stopped. we turned around and observed a circular, disk shaped object with bright multi colored lighting, about 30 yards in diameter, rising from behind some trees. it climbed to an altitude of 500 to 1000 foot and silently passed overhead of us and proceeded about 1\4 mile in front of our view where we were sitting. it hovered in that spot for about one minute as we sat there dazzled by what we were watching and then it shot straight up into the sky at an amazing speed and was gone from sight in less than 1 & 1\2 seconds. we looked at each other and asked each other if we all saw that or was it just something we imagined. it was clear that we all saw the same thing. we left the area about 1\2 hour later after much discussion about what we saw and decided to keep it to ourselves for fear of ridicule. the next morning we went back to the slag dump to ride bikes. we had been riding in the area for years and knew the trails very well. while riding along one trail where you had to make a sharp left and go down a little valley ( about 10 ft deep and 10 yards across that was 5 ft higher on the other side. i went to take the left turn down the little dip and had to lay my bike down to keep from falling into what was now a very large and deep crevasse in the area. it was now about 70 ft. deep and 50 yards to the other side. at first we thought it was mine subsidence, but what we found unexplainable was the trees and plants in the area didn't show any signs of it. everything was upright as though it had been like that for years. we retraced our steps several times and knew for sure we were in the right area and that something very very strange had happened here. we then reflected on what we had saw the night before. it was the same area where we has seen the object rise from behind the trees. at that point we were pretty sure that what we had observed had something to do with it. fast forward to a few weeks ago and i was looking at the area on google earth and a depression that approximates the size of the object we observed was visible in the ground where we observed the object arise from. attached is a google earth photo of the area markings for where we were sitting when the event occured, where the object rose from, and where it hovered before shooting straight up into the sky. i would be more than willing to take anyone to the area to look.
